DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , single-center , 3-way crossover study healthy subject confirm Helicobacter pylorus ( H. pylorus ) -negative . The study consist 3 study period separate washout period least 7 day . Subjects receive study drug daily 5 day . Barring safety concern , subject discharge study Day 6 Period 3 completion discharge procedure .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect 24-hour , Intragastric pH RAB ER 50-mg Capsules Compared With Esomeprazole ( Nexium ) 40 mg Capsules Rabeprazole ( Aciphex ) 20-mg Tablets
DOC.criteria: Key inclusion : Healthy male female subject , include woman childbearing potential , age 18 55 year , inclusive Subjects able tolerate insertion placement pH probe 2 occasion per study period ( Day 1 Day 5 ) Key Exclusion : Subjects H. pyloripositive Subjects history gastrointestinal disorder surgery likely influence drug absorption ( e.g. , history gastric resection ) Known hypersensitivity rabeprazole , esomeprazole , related compound ingredient formulation Other standard clinical pharmacology exclusion criterion healthy volunteer
DOC.keyword: effect gastric pH healthy , H. pylori-Negative subject
